channel.description: There are a lot of tutorials and youtube videos out there on using Naive Bayes for document classification. None of these tutorials are wrong, but they often hide some subtle points that if you think too hard about you will get confused. In this posts I want to explain what is really going on in Naive Bayes for spam classification. This post assumes that you are already familiar with Bayesâ€™ theorem.
